channel.title: Item help, projectp2p source
channel.description: i have had my source going good for a while now, but i keep getting the same problem over and over. when i edit the item defs to add a new item, or change an item. the item name doesnt change (even after a compile, and it is compressed properly back to .xml.gz) and if i try to get the new item in my inventory or anything that shows it my client crashes... someone tell me what im doing wrong?

item.title: Item help, projectp2p source
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

there isnt one on this client, ill get anotehr client!

Read full topic

item.title: Item help, projectp2p source
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

Look conf folder there should be itemdef file to like in server side. Open it with 7-zip and copy your server side file into it. Then it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Item help, projectp2p source
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

i dont see where you change itemdefs on the client side at all, could someone tell me where they are located within the client?

Read full topic

item.title: Item help, projectp2p source
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

maybe your client doesnt have the new items that ur trying to add, thats what mine did when i got a black p hat on my p2p source, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Item help, projectp2p source
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

If you are editing itemdef.xml u need to edit it on client side to. Both sides need to exactly same. Also same thing with all def files, need to be edited on client side to.

Read full topic
